lead_paragraph: They might be funny, but the late-night TV hosts are just as partisan in their jokes as the politicians they make fun of.
snippet: Jon Stewart and David Letterman joke about conservatives, Jay Leno and Jimmy Fallon about liberals. Who knew?

headline.main: Parsing Both Red and Blue in Late-Night TV Humor

abstract: Jon Stewart and David Letterman joke about conservatives, Jay Leno and Jimmy Fallon about liberals. Who knew?
